```{r}
# 1a.
vector1 <- c(-5:5)
vector1
# the output is a series of numbers from -5 up to 5

# 1b.

x
# the value of x will be 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 7
```

```{r}
#  2a.
seq1 <- seq(1, 3, by=0.2)
seq1
# the output is a series of number starting from 1 to 3 by 0.2 increment size
```
